text: Oea or Oia () was an ancient town on the island of Thera, mentioned by Ptolemy. Its site is located near Kamari, and some of its ruins are submarine. ==References== Category:Populated places in the ancient Aegean islands Category:Former populated places in Greece Category:Sunken cities Category:Santorini Category:Ancient Greek archaeological sites in Greece Category:Ancient Thera
title: Oea (Thera)
